# UDP

**Structure**

The system definition of the User Datagram Protocol (UDP).

## Declaration

```swift
struct UDP
```

## Overview

UDP supports sending and receiving datagrams.

## Initializers

- **init()**
- **init(_:)**

## Instance Methods

- **noChecksumPreferred(_:)**: Skip computing checksums when sending UDP packets.

## Conforms To

- DatagramProtocol
- MessageProtocol
- NetworkProtocolOptions
- OneToOneProtocol
